Name: Fading
About the game: Fading is a minimalist 2D platformer where you play through the mind of a man whose wife is dying of a terminal illness as you uncover a story of love, pain and loss. Key Features Simple and gorgeous minimalist art style. Immersive and graceful soundtracks. Various beautifully handcrafted levels.
